task.title: Viewing Pipeline and Stage Statistics
task.shortdesc: When you monitor a pipeline, you can view real-time summary and error statistics for the pipeline and for stages in the pipeline. You can view the pipeline or stage configuration to help determine if you need to make changes.

context.p: monitoringviewing statisticsBy default, the console displays pipeline monitoring information when it runs a pipeline. You can select a stage to view the statistics about the stage. Similarly, you can view different error details for the pipeline and stages.

The Monitor panel displays statistics on the following tabs:
Summary
For a pipeline, displays the record count for the pipeline, record and batch throughput, and batch processing statistics.
For a stage, displays record and batch throughput, and batch processing statistics. You can hover over different parts of the charts to view exact numbers.
Error For a pipeline, displays histograms for the number of error records by five minute decay and the number of error records by stage since the pipeline started. For a stage, displays the number of error records and the number of stage errors.
